thread.title: Swansea City boosted as Andre Ayew is set to return against Stoke City
thread.title_full: Swansea City boosted as Andre Ayew is set to return against Stoke City

title: Swansea City boosted as Andre Ayew is set to return against Stoke City
text:
Sports News | 10 October 2015 18:55 CET Swansea City boosted as Andre Ayew is set to return against Stoke City - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghana and Swansea City midfielder Andre Ayew 
Andre Ayew is on course for Swansea City’s meeting with Stoke City despite still nursing a knee problem. 
Ayew withdrawn from the Ghana squad for their friendly against Canada scheduled for Tuesday after taking a bang to the knee during Swansea’s draw with Tottenham last weekend. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
